desc.p: Fields DIARY.ID to SUB.ACCOUNT form a related multi value set.
Its a subvalued field whereas field DEPOSITORY is multivalued thus allowing authorisation
of ENTITLEMENT records for positions held in different subaccounts of the depository.
SUB.ACCOUNT cannot be defined without a DEPOSITORY.
Allows input of a valid subaccount defined in the Depositorys CUSTOMER.SECURITY record as
well as a value of MAIN. If MAIN is specified the ENTITLEMENT records relating to positions held in the depository main account i.e.without a sub account specified would be authorised.
If only the DEPOSITORY is specified without any subaccounts, then all the ENTITLEMENT
records relating to positions in that depository would be authorised, regardless of the subaccount that they are held in,if any.
The field is rendered redundant and is no longer in use.
Fields DIARY.ID to SUB.ACCOUNT form a related multi value set.
Accepts value of any CUSTOMER.SECURITY record which has its CUSTOMER.TYPE field set to 'DEPOSITORY'
